mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( email, nickname, password, auth_key ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{auth_key} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET auth_key = 'Y' WHERE email = #{email} AND auth_key = #{auth_key}
mapper.select: SELECT auth_key FROM user WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
SELECT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM user WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password} )
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM user WHERE nickname = #{nickname} )

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
